title: An Act to amend the definition of hate crime

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Barber of Somerville, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 1589) of Christine P. Barber and Patrick Joseph Kearney relative to the definition of hate crime.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
Hearing scheduled for 11/25/2025 from 10:00 AM-05:00 PM in A-2
